body: Juan Cristobal in Caracas Chronicles reports that, "This morning, dozens of families who lost their homes last December took to the streets to protest. According to press reports, the group was complaining they have been living in a flooded, rat-infested basement for weeks."
original_body: Juan Cristobal in Caracas Chronicles reports that, "This morning, dozens of families who lost their homes last December took to the streets to protest. According to press reports, the group was complaining they have been living in a flooded, rat-infested basement for weeks."
title: Venezuela: Rain Victims Protest Refuge Conditions

sentence: Juan Cristobal in Caracas Chronicles reports that, "This morning, dozens of families who lost their homes last December took to the streets to protest.
According to press reports, the group was complaining they have been living in a flooded, rat-infested basement for weeks."
